title: Asynchronous message processing with Lambda and IoT Core
description: API Gateway REST API integration with SQS, Lambda, and IOT

introBox.headline: How it works
text: A HTTP Request to API Gateway POST method will create a message with the request body to SQS. Lambda picks up the message uses the topic in the request body to send message to the IOT Data API endpoint
